Detailed Description

A StyleSymbol describes the graphic reprensentation of a symbol.

A StyleSymbol is a StyleItem that is used to draw the symbols of the keys. A StyleSymbol has either a SVG or a label. If a SVG is present, it is used to draw the symbol on the key. Otherwise, the label is printed over the key.

The symbol styles are loaded from the Style file.

See also:
StyleItem
